Class HTMLReaderTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.HTMLReaderTest

  • public class HTMLReaderTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Test case for the HTMLReaderImpl class access through the HTMLReader interface
    Author:
    Peter Hayes, Iain Ritchie
